column5: Sleek, modern feel with contemporary furniture and appointments, gorgeous hardwood floors and distinctly elegant bedroom  Eighth-floor residence  Gourmet kitchen  Stunning view of the Pegasus, once tallest skyscraper in Texas!  Amenities: Roof-Top pool  Luxurious Fitness center  5 stories indoor atrium with water fall  1-Free parking garage included  360 views of downtown Dallas from rooftop  Short walk to restaurants, bars, museums and Klyde Warren Park
